author: BluGoke
description: This mod changes some of the SFX for a different experience. Here are some of the sounds in the mod: Boost Sound:  Sonic and Sega All Stars Racing Trick Sound:  Atlas Kart Wii v6 Warning Sound:  Thwomp falling from the Mario Party DS minigame Toppling Terror Lightning Sound:  Probably from a Sonic game again (idk either) Item Box Break and Roulette:  Mario Kart Wii
title: Custom BFSAR soundpack
